content: magnolia is a delicate feminine wrap made up of motifs joined as-you-go it has elongated trapezoid shape which is easy to adjust to a triangle pattern has written step-by-step instructions chart and a photo-tutorial skill level is easy finished size width 65 /165 cm depth 20 5 /52 cm size is easily adjustable materials and tools needed lace-weight yarn approx 580 yds/530 m per 100 gr 3 skeins in total hook 2 5 mm tapestry needle scissors and blocking pins pattern is written in standard us terms thank you for visitng my store
